column5: Has anyone  seen my dog ? The last place I saw him was at Lak Air G2G...... I have enclosed a picture of him   If anyone sees this puppy please put the correct postage on his collar and send him to me.  Yes their is a big reward it is $ 10.00 more than Spiel offers you to not send him to me...  Thanks for the update photo Chris I have sent it to the other members of the "I love Brook fan club" down here.   Art
Tell ya what Art, if I find her, I'll bring her down personally     All I ask for is some down home cookin and a boat ride  Joey
hmm.. this could explain the luck lew and misty had.  http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=23324
She is a wonderful sweet animal!!!
....No worries Art, SHE sure loves to spend the day with ME in MY boat, God love her.
Perhaps if you give us some background, it may actually help with the recovery of the dog. When, where, how, and what date did you lose this dog?
Spiel told us that he has some new boat moves, so you're likely in better hands with Art.  LOL.  Good luck Art...funny....I've seen that dog before....hmmmm.....
:whistling:  Here Brook come get the nice juicy steak on the big boat........... is it working yet Chris???    Art
Hey Art...  You're dog has a striking resemblance to Spiel's...
I found three that look like that and mailed them to you, take yours and hold on to the other two until my neighbors post a reward.
